page.title: 19NOTEABLE PERSONS
page.content: {CHILDE OF HALE} John Middleton was born in 1578 to a poor family and was of simple nature. He is better known as the{Childe of {Hale.} Very little is known about his childhood, but legends of his youth are still the talk of the village. He grew to the most outstanding height of nine foot three inches. His white cottage still stands in the village, with its high sloped thatched roof, white washed with two windows high up in the gable, faces{Church {End.} The wooden pegs upon which the{Childe {of Hale}is supposed to have hung his hat and coat are still present in the cottage about ten feet above the floor.{ {The Childe of Hale}died in{1623}and is buried in the churchyard.
